comment_Text: Just plain bad. The premise is unique, so terrible trying to be "not like the other games". No ads, so of course it's awful because I can't watch my precious ads. It provides a challenge, which is completely heinous because I need everything handed to me. One good thing about it though is that there's no way to get back to the menu when you play. But that doesn't take away from the absolute awfulness of this game. DO NOT PLAY!!!

I barely write reviews, but I had to on this one because it was absolutely AWFUL. There are no ads which is absolutely terrible I like my games all ad and no game. The gameplay is absolutely terrible, it's easy to get and very fun. The menu is easy to navigate which is uncalled for and extremely frustrating. If I could I would rate it 0 stars.

It was a mess. My eyes hurt after playing the game because eye-straining colors with poor interface. It is not enjoyable to begin, it greatly lacks in background design and does not even have an effects. It did not even have an instruction or gameplay leaving me clueless on how the game works. Overall, it was a total eyesore. But I am sure that it will improve just a bit more motivation to plan.

The game itself isn't terrable, but extremely repetitive with what you do. Tap on the colour and the word that says the colour on it, but avoid the wrong word on the wrong colour. Simple, to the point, and repetitive with what you do, even without anything to attempt to spice it up a little bit. What you see is what you get, and I got a game that is the equivalent of putting a toothpick under your toenail and kicking a wall. Hell even thats more eventful than this terrable arcade game.

I like games with ads, but this one doesn't even have any ad, like no ads whatsoever. I played it and I didn't get an ad, like I need ads what are basically 30 secs long and you can't skip. The gameplay is very hard, even my fish drowned after seeing it. It's hard and no one can beat it. Game devs please add more ads and make us beat the game. (This was a joke, no offense to the devs in any way)

Not enough ads. This is driving me insane! Like, you want to make money from this, right? There's no popup ads or forced ads. All there is is some lousy ads at the bottom of the screen. Like get this, they still let you enjoy a full gaming experience while the ads are displayed. Ugh! One star! Terrible!

I am disappointed. The game does not have ads. Ads are the whole point of games. They are what stops you in the middle of a game. Ads are enjoyable to watch. Ads are awesome. Another bad thing about this horrible app is its gameplay. It was tremendously hard! I want to win a game instantly. WORST APP EVER! If I could give this trash 0 stars I definitely would.

I would rate this 0 stars if I could! I has no ads! How can I enjoy something if it has no ads! It also has an enjoyable game, which sucks because I like it! I hate liking things! I also hate how it has one of the most creative goals. That doesn't irritate me, which irritates me, because I like being irritated, but not in this scenario! 1 star!!!

As soon as I installed this app, my phone broke in half and is now two separate pieces. The touchscreen and keyboard apparently still work, but the camera doesnt. Thats what Id call cellular division. It also has way too many ads. Very annoying. Oh and also it made my right foot a bit laggy. It's just too bad for existance. Now my shower is also laggy. For some reason, my middle finger is negatively laggy, which means it moves before I actually decide to move it. Some people got mad at me. AAAAA

The app is so-so, the gameplay is not that good, and not that bad, it gets harder the longer you play it but it is also very forgiving.The moving boxes sometimes doesn't register the tap or it sometimes register 2 times which is a minor problem given that you can skip the tapping. Giving it a one star because it's what the devs want. Honest review : 1.5 stars, it doesn't stand out and it gets boring very fast(it's addicting tho). It needs a variety of customizations for it to reach 3-4 stars.

One star, it was boring and you don't expect much from it, except being the worst game ever. Game needed more features, at least add more mods to keep it interestingly longer. It also needs to change that sound effect when you get a right answer, I felt like I was bar-code scanning items in a grocery store.

Awful, this app is horrible. it didnt have ANY ads, which is basically the point of games. You really have to work and think to get score, which I think ruins all games, as I like things to be handed to me from the start. I don't recomend this app to anyone. I cant believe anyone could even possible make such a bad game.

Horrible, it had no ads! Which is my favorite part of games, I hate not being able to get ads in my face every millisecond! Second, it gave me bad luck, I had to donate my kidney to a dead person because it's so called "good for them" 2nd of all, my house burned down because I was drinking water, the water turned into flames after seeing the eye-straining colours. 3rd and last, I never got my chipotle.

What I think about this game is that it really needs a lot of improvements especially in the style, gameplay and game design. There are no enjoyable moment within the game. It is so plain and the colors of the shape are eye straining. It could be improved with the design of how the shapes float and with the interactivity of the buttons, maybe a more pleasing style for the eye. It needs more challenges, difficulties, and maybe another level for the players to enioy. And also a pause button.

Game was brilliantly made, not one miserable thought came to mind playing this. As I click on the lovely contrasted blocks of perfection, I couldn't help but feel as if I found the secret to life. This game, no. This paradise of experiences has taught me well. Thank you good sir.

The only good thing I can say about this game is that the challenge was enjoyable, otherwise, it was painful. The interface does not help in giving cues on what it is about and uses eye straining colors. There are no instructions. Gameplay-wise it similar it is to rhythm-based games. Flow of incoming blocks vary in speed and difficulty becomes a headache to catch up to. Overall, despite its flaws, it was fun to play. Would recommend to other people to suffer like I did. (this is for school btw)

I love this game, it is very entertaining and I have played it for hours. However, there are some major flaws with the game. The system guesses way too soon. Whenever you are going for a character you know is really rare, Akinator always guesses when you haven't given the system nearly enough input yet. Meaning it will always get it wrong. And when you finally get your character after many failed guesses, you aren't given the reward because of the systems failed guesses.

I like this app overall. It's entertaining and a fun activity. It's actually quite impressive how it figures out characters/ people with such little detail; however, ever since I redownloaded the app I've been having to watch so many ads which is an ad after every game additionally, they're very glitchy. I would suggest if the ads were more spread out such as once after every 4-5 games.

Just re-downloaded Akinator and I can say that things have changed for worse. The entire app seems to just be nagging it's users to watch advertisements. The app used to be fun with a few occasional ads here and then, but now it no longer has that spark. The app is covered in ads. I really dislike the fact that just to be able to see the characters, you have to watch an ad, especially for "rare characters." And sometimes you have to watch an ad 2-3 times before it finally shows the character.

The game itself is fun. I like the concept and all, but the knowledge base that the game can pull from is limited. You see people getting gold, platinum, and black tier awards for things I guarantee you've never heard of in your life and yet the game can't get characters from foreign movies, or even characters from older movies made in the US. It just seems a bit lacking and slightly unfair. Still fun though.

Was great until you had to start watching ads to reveal a "rare character" and half the time it's not even rare. I've had to watch an ad for a bronze that was played 20 minutes before me. That and now it doesn't even work half the time. I'll watch an ad and then it'll just sit there and not do anything begging me to buy the premium. Also it's started lagging a bunch taking forever to go to the next question and asking me to restart. Totally ruined experience.

Pretty fun, however he doesn't get many animals or TV/movies correct. Not to mention whenever I get a rare _ I either have to buy a premium potion, watch an ad that either doesn't pop up or doesnt work, or click no thanks and repeat the whole cycle over again. It's quite annoying and pisses me off, but I do personally know what it's like to make games/apps like this, and I personally think you should fix some bugs and issues, put a little disclaimer that says the game is under progress.

The "trap" system is bugged and unfair. Taking points away when you answer incorrectly by mistake or were actually thinking of said character but one detail didn't match! Get rid of it! Also having to watch an ad for a rare character is fine, but it's also bugged. Sometimes you watch an ad and it doesn't show the character and tries to make you watch more ads until you just have to close the game and start over.

Good concept, but it keeps finding me for "cheating" and removing all my ranking points, even though it guessed my animal correct, not to mention the ads all the time I get a rare animal. I was thinking of a mastodon and then when it guessed mastodon, I obviously clicked "yes", then it was like some kind of validation thing some "trap", please either refine this feature, or maybe remove it. Also fix the ads.

This is a fun time waster, and it's incredibly accurate at guessing what you're thinking of by using your phone's stored search histories. My only issue is when it has a locked character. Either you can watch a video, pay, or skip. I won't spend $5 on something I won't use, so I go for the video ad. Problem is the ad will not play, so I'm forced to pick the pay or skip options. I'm not paying, so it's just a frustrating cock block. Otherwise, a fun game if you don't value your privacy.

this would be a much better app if you didn't have to pay to play. All the non-frequently guessed or underrated characters that would get you a lot of pts are VIP. Now, this wouldn't be an issue, except for you CAN'T WATCH A VIDEO TO CLAIM IT. I tried, and it kicks me out of the app every time, even though it has no problems bombing me with another ad every time I guess a character.

Edit: 3 to 1 You don't get rewards for beating the genie and adding new character info. Which the goal used to be goal of the game, but now he has to guess your character for it to count. Too many ads, especially if you get a "rare character" because that's the only way you can check without paying. The create account option within the app doesn't work, the "done" button doesn't respond. So I couldn't even keep my progress before deleting to make room on my phone.

This game is fun until nearly every character you choose is a VIP character and you have to either watch a video or pay to find out who he thinks it is. Also, I tried the watching a video option and it just took me to a screen with an advertisement (Not a video, an image.) that didn't progress. Even once the timer (which I assume was supposed to be counting down to the start of the video) ran out, it just kept me on the same screen. If I tapped the X button (which was the only option besides waiting forever), it took me back to the same screen that asked if I'd like to pay or watch a video to find out who my so called "VIP character" was. I remember a few years back, I used to play this game for hours and I didn't have these issues. It's all about the money now, I guess.

Very good at guessing common characters/objects/concepts, but once you start throwing rare or very rare characters/concepts, it fails consistently. The algorithm doesn't ask enough questions and guesses too soon to get some of the things I've thrown at it, making it extremely difficult to get platinum and black awards. Sometimes even gold awards are difficult to obtain because the algorithm simply guesses too soon. Keep asking questions!

This app is very impressive. The accuracy of the AI is remarkable, as is the speed it can reach a conclusion, sometimes even at seemingly obscure subjects. It's suprised me on multiple occasions just how well the AI is implemented. I understand the frustration with the ads, but I think rating it one star simply because of that, is unfair. It's one of the most impressive apps on the market, and it doesn't cost very much to remove the ads. Imo, people feel too entitled to enjoy a free experience.

I used to play this a lot when it was just on the computer and not an app. It's a lot of fun and will guess your character correctly most of the time, no matter how obscure you try to be. But now that's it's an app it's completely lost its charm. When I would do the 20 questions it would say I had used a "VIP Character" and had to watch an ad or pay to get my answer. Used to be fun, turned cheap.

The app is poorly made. It gets slower and slower the longer you use it, eventually needing to close and restart it to play anymore. Also, switching to another app and then back in sometimes breaks the audio. However, it is a decent upgrade of the browser game, with a customizable genie, a points system, and daily challenges. It has a VIP version for $4, but DO NOT buy this. After playing for an hour or so it gives you VIP status for free.

Used to be good until I opened it again yesterday. I guess the new update means you get ads every 5 seconds. It was pretty annoying and I wasn't able to enjoy even 2 minutes of the game without a 30 second non slip able ad playing. And what's up with every rare guess you have to watch an ad just to see the guess? It's really bothersome and I uninstalled after about 20 minutes of trying to play again.

I have genuin fun playing this game, I just wish it had less ads. While your playing the game it's great, but it gives you some annoying pop-up ad half the time and sometimes it doesn't even give you your answer unless you watch a 30 second ad. Other than the ads the game is very fun and i'd definitely recommend it!

Only fun on computer. I try to get him to guess a character, sit there bashing my head into a wall, get "you're thinking of a rare character!" Click "watch an ad" no ad pops up, forcing me to repeat the cycle. Fix your broken app. And the one time it did work, the thing jumped to a conclusion and it was nowhere near the guy I wanted.

It's reward structure is backwards. The more guesses it takes and especially if it doesn't know the character should be the most rewarding. Yet the game seems to want you to find characters that are already popular. Then there's the "rare" character thing that you need a premium thing to even view its guess. This is just poor design.

There's a problem with getting black awards. These are likely obscure characters, and people either don't know them, or want to mess with someone who is in the lead. Either way they mark some legit characters as not real, and the award gets removed and a penalty is assigned. It's really annoying and the developers may have abandoned the game, as it doesn't seem like they're making any more improvements, so the problem will continue.

I love this app so much! I like how you can do items, animals, and movies! However, in some languages, you can do locations, and I'd really like to see that in the English version please!! :) However, sometimes Akinator asks the same questions twice, sometimes consecutively, and he dosent get the answer even when its obvious!! I really wish you would update it so that Akinator guesses the answers easier. But other than that that, this app is amazing!!

It's a great game and a great way to pass time, it's also really addicting. The only problem is a bug on the object opption, it says the same thing for the real or fictional person option. "Think about a real or fictional character. I will read your mind." It's a great game even with than that small bug. But it will be confusing for new players who don't know what that option is supposed to be.

Great at first! And then... Loved playing it! Got 1st in the leaderboards, and tried really hard, then it said he thought I was faking it because I was answering too fast. I'm upset because he knocked me down to #238 from #1 place all because I was answering too fast! And another thing is sometimes it says I HAVE to pay to get a rare object, even though before it just let me watch an ad. It's frustrating and I'd rather spend my time doing something else at this point.

The ads to unlock content after using the app for a couple days, forcing you to buy the product or have no access to most of the characters, defeating the entire purpose of the entire app. Oh, but the ads between every single god damn round? Those work perfectly fine.

Played this game when it first came out and it was great. Now it's just a cash grab. Every friggin character is a "rare" character and requires you to watch a video to see it even if they get it wrong. It also has ads between each character play. I understand devs need to make money, but this was ridiculous. After the first guess it it seems to just start tossing out random questions. Sometimes asking the same question 5 questions apart multiple times. It's a shadow of what it used to be.

Love this game, but I hate the fact when you get a gold, plat or black medal, you dont show up on the front page. I got a black, and front page guy was on there for 12 minutes already. I waited another 10 minutes and it switched to someone else. Kinda lame to have that feature but it be broken. 3 stars until its fixed. Also, just pay for no ads, its worth it if you like it and use it alot like myself. The game is a 1 star without ad removal.

Ads are annoying, I'd rather be given an ad then pretend it was because I got a "rare" character. The system for catching people who are randomly answering is flawed and can mess you up even when you are trying to get specific character. If it "catches" you, you loose your spot on the rankings as well.

I used to love this app, but I have to give it a bad review. The fact that I have to pay to see a rare character, object, etc is just scummy. You can have a long game going, but the second Akinator decides to take you to that screen, and you don't want to pay, your game is just over. The game is damn near unplayable now. If you want more money, just add some more cosmetics.

I love this game, cuz you can think of a variety of things existing in reality/imagination worlds. But the problem is there are too many ads, some of the ads when you just play as a demo, there is x button to escape from that dungeon nightmare, like it's grayed out, and redirecting you to Google Play, I understand that fake mobile gaming ads can scam and fustraite people, but pls fix that thing with X Button, I swear!!!!

Got a new phone and my purchase for no ads didn't restore. I constantly get an error message when selecting the option to restore purchases. I have contacted them 6 times, and they're ignoring my request. I can't even deal with an ad until they bother to give me what I paid for, because the "watch video" option doesn't work.

The game's fun is just every time I try to get a black award I usually do it's just it takes me many attempts so I don't actually get the award and it says I asked to keep trying but every time I do it takes me many attempts defeating the purpose I wish that you remove this feature cuz it's incredibly tedious and annoying.

Bit of an ad-fest, but no worse than many in that respect . Gets a bit "same-y" quite quickly and keeps repeating the same answer after a while rather than admit defeat, but entertaining so far as it goes. Wish search engines ran along similar lines....

This is a cool game, it just has some flaws. First of all, ADS!! WAY. TOO. MANY. Every time after you win an aki award and the genie dude finishes guessing your character, there is ALWAYS an ad. Second of all, the genie dude keeps bringing up this youtuber J10B100. I dont even know her. Lastly, it is SO hard to get the black aki award. You always get the standard award. I mean, it is a bit easy I guess to get the gold award, but still. Although the game has flaws, it is a pretty cool game.

Love this app, however it's not a app that doesn't need internet and it's has a lot of ads. For rare characters I will have to watch 2-3 apps for one. I hate when you get points taking off if he doesn't get it right.

Downloaded this app a long ways back. We had so much fun with this app. Naturally got a new phone and lost the app. Ran across this in the play store and re-downloaded it. Still so much fun!! I try to stump the akinator and I fail each time LoL. I will one day beat the akinator...until then I will have fun doing it!!!!

Fun game (prefer the Alexa one) but when you get a 'rare' character you get the option to watch a video of give money, however it's not really a choice as clicking the 'watch a video ' button doesn't actually do anything. Then if you say no thanks it just starts the questions over.
A bit of fun, good on well-known characters. Tends to repeat questions on more obscure characters. Really needs to add a "same as 30 seconds ago when you asked this before" buttom.

this is so frustrating, after so many tries still it fails to guess the rare character on one go. it shows repeatedly the same character which is very much annoying.Occasionally akinator failed to award me for rare character though I did win still it didn't care to award me with black diamomd even though I was deserving, disgusting.

Good game so far, the questions do seem to be random, answering questions that aren't relevant are hard to say the least without searching the internet for information. Not as many ads at the beginning as I thought. Though some questions are similar to one another. Sometimes when saying "no" to a question doesn't seem to matter for he will skip that part and may give you something that does have what that question says. (Don't know of that's just me though.)
It just changes the topic too much sometimes when talking for a particular thing, and that causes the questions to go so long that at the end, it says "your object is rare" and then nothing.

This sucks ,when you finally find an object which would've been black rated ,you have to choose to redeem it between watching a video(which you can't ) pay to see it or just loose it and nether have anything more rare than bronze ,plz fix it ...if you do I might change my mind on the one star.

This app is awful, you need to watch an ad to progress past 20 questions, then you need to watch an ad before asking those questions, then you need to watch an ad if Akinator answers correctly. Save yourself the time and don't even download this pile of garbage
Rather fun at down times challenging him and even better in the rare times he just doesn't get it. Twice so far I've found Characters he's unable to guess and still going.
The game is fun and all but whenever I guess a "rare character" and watch an ad to see it it never shows me the character. Try after try, ad after ad, I get nothing.
Uncanny. I tried the free version and was so impressed I bought the paid version. By far the cleverest of these guessing games. It even got my obscure French film!
Thia game is pretty cool! Not a lot of ads, smooth game play, and calming. It's really neat that the game can figure out what you're thinking by asking questions. Neat game to try out!!
Really good, it's very fun and mind blowing.but it does have ads in it but certain times and it's also free.
Cant open the app, it says, "PROBLEME_RESEAU". Just wasted my storage. Not even hoping for the developers to fix this since I wont going back to this app anymore.

I've had many rare characters, I'm happy to pay a couple of dollars for a laugh but for some unknown reason the links don't work. If you want to make money, maybe you should make sure your app works properly.
I cannot belive this guy guessed my movies correctly 3 times. This app is really fun and cool. Definitely a 5 star. It's amazing!

Good but.... Sometimes I am very blown away by the answers but I think it could use some refining. Rather than just use algorithms and stereotypes of the masses, maybe try to show people that they didnt get the answer they wanted for "this" reason. For instance, Bishop from Marvel is not African American. He is from Australia...

Too many ads. Whenever I get a rare character I watch the ad but it doesn't let me see my character, and so I have to watch another ad because of this glitch. Fix this glitch because it is too irritating and I feel like we are being played by the developers just to watch more ads so they can get more money. And from I've seen in other reviews, I could buy the potion is useless because the game still glitches and makes you watch ad after ad.
I like this game the only thing that bothers me and annoys me is it sais that if your character is white or black and that's really rascis but the game is still fun and very smart
App is super buggy. Doesnt display character result. The developers need to fix it

I really enjoy this game but it needs a serious update on its database. A lot of information is over 10 years out of date and I've noticed it on several occasions. For example, the system thinks Mark Sanchez (who is a 35 year old retired NFL QB.)

Great app! It's fun and addictive. However, there are few minor issues. For example : It's not simple to understand the player ranking system, The game should explain more about itself so that we can have more fun. That's about it. Overall, a really fun game to spend time.

Hi there. I love this game, and it's really fun to play. However, I added a character by the name of "James Ulybka." He has no picture, and his description is cut off. Can you please look into fixing this? Thank you!

I love the app the only problem is that it guesses WAY too fast Where it just makes it boring but other than that I totally would recommend this app and I'm really impressed because I have been playing this app for 6 hours and It never guessed wrong
This app was nice it is just that one pic that scare's me a little i did put on the kid filter on but i still get that one pic that scare's me and i am younge but hey, it is super fun!

Great, amazing app. It actually reads my mind, but sometimes it fails. You have to fix some bugs though

Started out fun until there were more and more ads to see the Akinators guess. Now I can watch the ad 8 times and it still won't let my see the character. I think this is just like the best game I've experienced so far, and I really just liked the idea of there being a genie which I was a bit curious about. Would be great except for the fact that anytime I think of a rare character I have to watch an ad to see them. Which wouldn't be a problem if it actually doesn't, but I'll watch like 2 or 3 ads and it still won't work! Please fix this

A very fun game! You think of a character, show/movie, object, or animal, and the Akinator tries to think of it. Most of the time you think of a standard thing, but sometimes you think of a good one and get a "rare" medal! Other times you think of something Akinator doesn't know, it asks what the name of it is or what it's called, asks for a discription, and it sends it to them! Again, it's really fun, and I recommend it if you like people to guess what you're thinking!

This is the best thing I've ever downloaded, the graphics is astounding and the gameplay is smooth, the map is really massive and there's so much to do, I met a lot of friends who helped me along my journey in the game, I didn't encounter any bugs or glitches, just one thing tho, please add more outfits to the game, oh and the boss at the top of tower is really hard to beat unless you have that weapon that has only 0.00001% of acquiring which is a huge bummer, please make it easier to acquire.

Hopefully they fix them because I'd love to see where this game goes in the future!

Great game! The graphics are pretty nice.. but I have noticed a game breaking glitch, if you shake the screen, there will be a box that says "69" and a text box. If you type in it, the game will close itself and when you open, every number is a 69 spam. But they have fixed this in an update, thank god! Also, soundtrack is very nice.

Awesome app. It's very entertaining and, nicely designed. The buttons in the game are not to small and not to large. The buttons are also nice colors. The color (Which is black) is a great color choice. Best game in app history.

I'd say the best mobile game out there. In my personal experience it's very inspirational and filled with goofy characters. I've always dreamed of making a game one day and it's inspiring to see that. The graphics are smooth and do much to do! I'd consider installing.!

Amazing and immersive graphics. I'm having a hard time with level 4, but at least I got the Commodore's key so I can at least get off the ship. The soundtrack to this game really makes it hard to put down. Any truth about this game coming to Xbox or PS?

I will admit, at first I didn't understand the hype - but once the world opened up, it floored me. I was overwhelmed with splendor. It was almost too much to take in at first, but once I steadied my shaken mental fortitude enough to muster a clammy grasp on this masterpiece, everything just came together. Now I am ripping through the paces with complete immersion, completely enveloped in what is quite possibly the greatest game of the decade. GOTY for sure.

it's a great game! very interactive and there's lots to do. there's a few glitches with furniture placing although they aren't a big deal. farming monsters is easy but it's hard to get past the chimera boss, i think you have to make the boss fight easier. even with the S rank weapons that i have it's still a challenging boss to beat. i also love the soundtrack especially the soundtrack for the cherry blossom biome. i recommend this game to everyone!

This game is incredible. The graphics are stunning. I also like character development and the soundtrack. I downloaded it not that long ago, but I'm getting close to the boss. The only thing I'd reccomend is making the loading screen faster.

Gorgeous, brilliant, amazing, this is one of the best app out there, it easy to use and really useful, whenever i feel bad i just open this and chill, really recommend The color of the background just blend perfectly together with the black front making a breath taking view, there are only one word for the graphic and music â¨ P E R F E C T I O Nâ¨

Hey hey! I deleted my almost a year old review (minus 14 days but who's counting) To say that over this year, I have almost finished the game! There is one glitch I have come across though... When you get to world 3629 and she dyes her hair (that level) it looks like her finger is a different color then the rest of her body. Not realistic like every single other thing. Anywho... Great game! 5 stars. Edit: the "glitch" was part of the story line. Takes a while to load still tho...

Great but this rating will remain 4 stars untill the bug is fixed

This is the most fun experience I had in a app the story straight down to the action and weapons and characters I wish it was a little more complex though like try adding puzzels to get to the boss room or add more characters it has a massive map a bunch of side missions and tons of npcs best app ever.

This game is amazing. It gas a lot of types of characters to choose from. The graphics are real smooth too. There are so many quest. This game really keeps you busy. It's the perfect game to play when you are bored. Great work!

Oh my this app is amazing! The characters are perfect and the gameplay is simple. The storyline is excellent all while taking little to no space at all in your phone. I spend HOURS on this game, super fun to play!

Best game ever the zombies were overpowered but the upgrade after buying M416 was really cool but the boss wasn't too hard to defeat after level 7 and the lady after level 2 helped a lot but she killed my dog by the way very nice game after all there is very cool features and pretty awesome and beautiful places and the best was after level 49 pretty cool keep making these type of games keep it up but who ever is downloading this game I want to tell you that there is nothing to do we all werejoke

All that has to be said has already been said in the countless other reviews of this true beautiful work of art. To be honest, if you charged $1,000,000 for this absolutely beautiful app I would happily purchase it and be fully content- nay, happy- with my decision. I would give it 6 stars if possible. It is like any other app, but remove everything and you have art. At first it is boring, but when you see its true form, nothing, you embrace it and it feels like everything you were destined for.

A life changing experience . When I opened the app I felt the power and knowledge in my veins. I know the universes deepest corners I can sense anything. I am currently using 100% of my brain . The graphics , sound effects all the details gone into this app was amazing 11/10 would reccomend

This game is absolutely beautiful and amazing. The graphics are stunning and the UI is so easy-to-use. I even get 420 FPS on a Nokia phone! It is also very minimal which is also the reason I love this app!

This app changed my life. Before downloading the app, I was very lazy & clumsy. Now I am totally a different person. It helps me to stay focused on my tasks. Though it says "nothing" but it features almost everything. It's just a marketing tactics, don't get fool by the description. Download the app now and see the change yourself.

This, 100% is my favourite app. I love the characters, the graphics, the plot twists, the story, everything! Love the game. No other game holds a candle to this. If you want to not download this, youremmaking a big mistake. This changed my life. 5 stars.

Thank you so much for creating this app. May god bless you whoever you are. And for those who do not understand the use of this app I will tell you, the purpose is to do nothing, think of nothing at all when your brain is not working fine and need a break once in a while, say 5 to 10 min in an hour. It is crucial to realease some happy hormones or let the brain take a break to keep working in its best state by cutting the excess stress, thats all. Please change the false description. Thank you.

Nothing is truly the best application I have ever used on the Android platform. With it's wide array of features, it can be an incredibly powerful tool; You can do so many things with it! It even helped me cure my crippling depression! 10/10, will definitely be back again.

This was the most epic game i have ever played!!! I thought level 4 was a little hard land i got stuck for some time. But the graphics, soundtrack, and everything else were such perfection! Truly an amazing game, and would reccomend to everyone!!!!!!

Well first when I saw this app on play store out of the the blue I downloaded it because of a good rating. Then I saw that this app is literally nothing and I was like this can't be!! So I shaked it and saw only two numbers 1 and 2 so I thought it was related to konami (I am a big ninja fan) then I pressed random buttons and got a TEN HOUR VIDEO!!! Well this explains it a glass is either half empty or half full never lose hope. The only problem is that this game is cool but way too small!!

I am actually mystified by the world that was created in this app. Some may think the whole point is shaking the phone, or even swiping the screen to unlock buttons, but the real point is using those hints to help unlock the game (incredible btw I'm on level 284) but please dont write a bad reveiw if you dont understand the game, because this game does not deserve less than a 5. So download nothing, play the game, and have the world of nothing take you away from reality.
I had to make a PowerPoint presentation about an application, and I chose this one! The comments and the whole game is just so amazing, it really does make a good presentation to show my whole class!

it honestly exceeded my expectations. my life's perspective has forever changed and my depression is now gone. This is a masterpiece. It's a brilliant contemporary piece on the pace of our everyday lives. It opened up my eyes to a whole new world of possibility, to venture even further than what I thought was feasible. It made me realize that some things in life may seem so complex, so mystifying, so vague; but in the end we spend so much time looking, searching, seeking a higher purpose, a deeper meaning that we overshadow the beauty in it's simplicity. This is not a game. It's an experience. Remarkable.

loving the update, the music really fits the falling snow! Update: I literally wrote a meme review like everyone else, but I found laying the phone/tablet flat and spinning it turns on the actual game, then I Rick Rolled myself.
